text: The 2015 World Sambo Championships was held in Casablanca, Morocco between the 12 and 16 November 2015. This tournament included competition in both Sambo, and Combat Sambo. ==Medal overview== ===Combat Sambo Events=== {| |- |rowspan=2| Half-flyweight (52 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Flyweight (57 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Half-lightweight (62 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Lightweight (68 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Welterweight (74 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Half-middleweight (82 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Middleweight (90 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Half-heavyweight (100 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2| Heavyweight (+100 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} == References == == External links == *http://www.eurosambo.com/en/competitions/2015/206/ Category:World Sambo Championships World Sambo Championships, 2015 Category:2015 in sambo (martial art)
title: 2015 World Sambo Championships
